0.text: Innate - Human Form: Elise gains one dormant Spiderling whenever she hits an enemy with an ability, storing up to 2 / 3 / 4 / 5 (based on  Human Form's Rank) at a time.
0.html: Innate - Human Form: Elise gains one dormant Spiderling whenever she hits an enemy with an ability, storing up to 2 / 3 / 4 / 5 (based on Human Form's Rank) at a time.
markedPassages: 2 / 3 / 4 / 5 (based on Human Form's Rank)

1.text: Innate - Spider Form: Elise's basic attacks deal 10 / 20 / 30 / 40 (based on  Spider Form's Rank) (+ 20% AP) bonus magic damage and  heal her for 4 / 6 / 8 / 10 (based on  Spider Form's Rank) (+ 8% AP)  on-hit.
1.html: Innate - Spider Form: Elise's basic attacks deal 10 / 20 / 30 / 40 (based on Spider Form's Rank) (+ 20% AP) bonus magic damage and heal her for 4 / 6 / 8 / 10 (based on Spider Form's Rank) (+ 8% AP) on-hit.

0.text: Active: Elise fires a toxin at the target enemy that deals magic damage, with the damage based on the target's health ratio being capped against  monsters.
0.html: Active: Elise fires a toxin at the target enemy that deals magic damage, with the damage based on the target's health ratio being capped against monsters.

0.content: 40 / 75 / 110 / 145 / 180 (+ 4% (+ 3% per 100 AP) of target's current health)

markedPassages: monsters

0.text: Active: Elise summons a venom-gorged spider for 3 seconds, which is  untargetable and crawls to the target location, navigating its path upon encountering terrain.
0.html: Active: Elise summons a venom-gorged spider for 3 seconds, which is untargetable and crawls to the target location, navigating its path upon encountering terrain.
markedPassages: untargetable

1.text: The spider explodes upon contact with an enemy or at the end of its lifespan, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies.
1.html: The spider explodes upon contact with an enemy or at the end of its lifespan, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies.

2.text: If the spider does not hit an enemy before reaching the target location, it chases down a nearby enemy, prioritizing  champions and gaining  bonus movement speed based on its proximity to the target.
2.html: If the spider does not hit an enemy before reaching the target location, it chases down a nearby enemy, prioritizing champions and gaining  bonus movement speed based on its proximity to the target.
markedPassages: champions
bonus movement speed

0.text: Active: Elise fires a web in the target direction,  stunning the first enemy hit for a few seconds, during which they are also  revealed.
0.html: Active: Elise fires a web in the target direction, stunning the first enemy hit for a few seconds, during which they are also revealed.
markedPassages: stunning
revealed

0.text: Active: Elise  pounces at the target enemy with her fangs and bites them, dealing magic damage and applying  on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness. The damage based on the target's health ratio is capped against  monsters.
0.html: Active: Elise pounces at the target enemy with her fangs and bites them, dealing magic damage and applying on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness. The damage based on the target's health ratio is capped against monsters.

0.content: 70 / 105 / 140 / 175 / 210 (+ 8% (+ 3% per 100 AP) of target's missing health)

1.text: If there are active  Spiderlings or  Volatile Spiderlings nearby, they will  dash alongside Elise towards Venomous Bite's target and reprioritize them.

1.text: Active: Elise and her  Spiderlings gain bonus attack speed for 3 seconds.
1.html: Active: Elise and her Spiderlings gain bonus attack speed for 3 seconds.
markedPassages: Spiderlings

2.text: Skittering Frenzy  resets Elise's basic attack timer. Elise loses Skittering Frenzy immediately when she switches to  Human Form.
2.html: Skittering Frenzy resets Elise's basic attack timer. Elise loses Skittering Frenzy immediately when she switches to Human Form.
markedPassages: resets

0.text: Active: Elise and her  Spiderlings lift up into the air,  vanishing and becoming  unable to act for up to 2 seconds and granting  sight of the area for the duration.
0.html: Active: Elise and her Spiderlings lift up into the air, vanishing and becoming unable to act for up to 2 seconds and granting sight of the area for the duration.

unable to act

1.text: Rappel can be recast on a target enemy within the duration, and does so automatically after the duration without a target.
1.html: Rappel can be recast on a target enemy within the duration, and does so automatically after the duration without a target.

2.text: Recast: Elise and her  Spiderlings instantly  descend behind the target, or their current position if there is no target.
2.html: Recast: Elise and her Spiderlings instantly descend behind the target, or their current position if there is no target.
markedPassages: Spiderlings
descend

3.text: If cast directly on an enemy, Elise and her  Spiderlings automatically recast on the target after 1 second. Upon landing this way,  Spider Queen's bonuses are increased for 5 seconds.
3.html: If cast directly on an enemy, Elise and her Spiderlings automatically recast on the target after 1 second. Upon landing this way, Spider Queen's bonuses are increased for 5 seconds.
markedPassages: Spiderlings
Spider Queen's

4.text: Rappel's recast can be used while affected by  cast-inhibiting crowd control.
4.html: Rappel's recast can be used while affected by cast-inhibiting crowd control.

1.text: Toggle: Elise switches between her  Human Form and  Spider Form.
1.html: Toggle: Elise switches between her Human Form and Spider Form.

2.text: Spider Form: Elise transforms into a spider, gaining  25 bonus movement speed,  melee basic attacks with  125 range, and access to her arachnid abilities. Additionally, she summons all stored  Spiderlings.
2.html: Spider Form: Elise transforms into a spider, gaining  25 bonus movement speed, melee basic attacks with  125 range, and access to her arachnid abilities. Additionally, she summons all stored Spiderlings.
markedPassages: 25 bonus movement speed
melee
125 range
Spiderlings

3.text: Human Form: Elise transforms into a human, gaining  ranged basic attacks, and access to her human abilities. Additionally, she stores all active Spiderlings.
3.html: Human Form: Elise transforms into a human, gaining ranged basic attacks, and access to her human abilities. Additionally, she stores all active Spiderlings.
markedPassages: ranged

4.text: Elise begins with one rank in Spider Form / Human Form and can increase it at levels 6, 11, and 16.
4.html: Elise begins with one rank in Spider Form / Human Form and can increase it at levels 6, 11, and 16.
